title: 'Big' fire at Iran's notorious Evin prison
description: The authorities said the blaze had broken out as a result of "unrest" inside the jail but was now under control. Also; Uganda imposes restrictions on movement in two districts affected by a worsening Ebola outbreak, and, after saying he will, Elon Musk now says he won't charge for usage of his Starlink services that are crucial to Ukraine's war effort against Russia.
itunes:subtitle: The authorities said the blaze broke out as a result of "unrest" inside the jail
itunes:summary: The authorities said the blaze had broken out as a result of "unrest" inside the jail but was now under control. Also; Uganda imposes restrictions on movement in two districts affected by a worsening Ebola outbreak, and, after saying he will, Elon Musk now says he won't charge for usage of his Starlink services that are crucial to Ukraine's war effort against Russia.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
